Instance.description: A situation base class for loud neighbors.

TunableTuple.name: complain_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a player Sim has banged on the neighbor's door and we are waiting for them to complain to the neighbor.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: neighbor_situation
Tunable.description: The Situation for the loud neighbor to come out and see what the player wants when they bang on the door.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: turn_off_loud_door_state
Tunable.description: If enabled, we will set the door to the loud door off state when entering this situation state.

Tunable.name: loud_door_state_off
Tunable.description: State to set on the apartment door of the loud neighbor when they are no longer being loud.

Tunable.name: loud_door_state_on
Tunable.description: State to set on the apartment door of the loud neighbor when the situation starts.

TunableList.name: loud_neighbor_filters
TunableList.description: Sim filters that fit the description of loud neighbor(s). We run through them until we find someone matching the filter.

TunableVariant.description: The filter we want to use to find loud neighbors.

Tunable.name: aggregate_filter
Tunable.description: An aggregate Sim Filter to find a loud neighbor that has other Sims.

Tunable.name: single_filter
Tunable.description: A Sim Filter to find a loud neighbor.

TunableTuple.name: loud_neighbor_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a neighbor starts being loud. This will listen for a Sim to bang on the door and complain about the noise before transitioning to the complain state.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableTuple.name: loot_actions_on_situation_start
TunableTuple.description: A list of loot actions and a delay before they are applied to all instanced sims on the active lot.

Tunable.name: delay
Tunable.description: The delay in sim minutes before we give the loot to Sims on lot. This delay starts from when the loud state is set on the neighbor's door.

TunableList.name: loot_actions
TunableList.description: Loot Actions that will be applied to instanced Sims on lot when this situation starts.

Tunable.description: A loot action applied to instanced Sims on the active lot when the situation starts.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.
